author: Reuters Editorial
title: Germania colloca 2,492 mld Bund 10 anni, tasso medio sale a 0,69% Bond |
text: BERLINO, 7 The German Finance Agency, the federal government's debt management office, sold 2.492 billion euros in a top up of its 0.50 percent, 10-year Bund at the lowest price of 98.16, the Bundesbank said on Wednesday. The notes (ISIN:DE0001102440) are due to mature on Feb 15, 2028. The settlement date is Feb 09. Results of Jan 10 sale included for reference: AUCTION DATE 07/02/18 10/01/18 AVG. YIELD 0.69 pct 0.54 pct AVG. ACCEPTED PRICE 98.17 99.63 LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 98.16 99.6 TAIL 0.01 0.03 TOTAL BIDS 3.756 bln euros 4.561 bln euros ALLOTTED 2.492 bln euros 4.026 bln euros RETAINED 0.508 bln euros 0.974 bln euros BID COVER RATIO 1.5 1.1 TOTAL VOLUME 8.0 bln euros 5.0 bln euros Auction details in German can be found at . ((Berlin newsroom; Tel: +49 30 2888 5142; Email: berlin.econ@news.reuters.com) Keywords: GERMANY BUND/
